title: Tasker Now
summary: The power of Tasker together with the power of Google
description: ******This is a Tasker plugin, it requires: Tasker 4.4+******Use Google Assistant as input for Tasker from your phone or smartwatch! descriptionHTML:
******This is a Tasker plugin, it requires: Tasker 4.4+******
Use Google Assistant as input for Tasker from your phone or smartwatch! To setup a profile with Tasker Now open Tasker and select "Event" in the Profiles tab.

Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/107846871867669301384

Tell about us:
TuttoAndroid - http://www.tuttoandroid.net/applicazioni/tasker-now-permette-di-usare-google-now-come-input-per-tasker-244141/
HdBlog - http://android.hdblog.it/2015/01/07/tasker-now-comandi-google-now/
AndroidWorld - http://www.androidworld.it/2015/01/07/tasker-google-now-insieme-per-lassistente-vocale-definitivo-267042/

How to activate on Android Wear:
1) Say "take a note" and then the command
2) Say "start vocal command" and then say the command
3) Open the app and then say the command
4) Send a special notification from smartphone. The notification is sent via a Tasker Now action in Tasker.
5) Shaking

To access to the settings on Wear:
Open the app on wear and swipe to the right

Several match rules:
- exact match
- at least one word
- all the word specified
- start with rule
- end with rule
- regular expression
- sub-string rule
- template rule (a template is for example "send <contact> message <msg>", the plug is going to create two custom variables called %contact and %msg filled with your words)
- ignore punctuation
you can use Tasker variables in the edit text and you can detect a language offline.

On a smartphone you can use the accessibility service or use a sentence of this kind:
"Ok Google, search in Tasker Now"

Some images from: http://www.wear-generator.com according to CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
comments: Had an issue, complained, then fixed by developer. Great app
Whenever I try to use Task now from Google assistant it says  - Task Now isn't supported in this region. I am already subscribed. Couldn't use for a single time. Please help.  Yes. It's English.
Is it possible to get it working even when phone is lock ot in sleeping mode?
Does exactly as described with great support. (just like all the apps from this developer)
Needs an action to trigger a voice recognition process on the watch, isolated to just that task. Basically I'm trying to make a parrot to mess with people

It was my go-to before author got greedy.  Now he wants me to pay again every month for functionality I already paid for.  Never.  Use Autovoice, use Shortcuts to avoid extra verbage.  It is faster and more customizable anyways.  I was already having to use shortcuts with Tasker Now to shut up google before Tasker Now dismissed it anyways.  Edit: Pixel XL here, so for us Google Now is not an option, Google Assistant or nothing.  Considering I paid for the functionality to work with Google Assistant once, months ago, why would I pay it again every month after it was disabled in what I already pay for, when I can use a competing utility I already own?  Suit yourselves but I'm not buying into the subscription model for this or any other app.  And I'm a developer, so I understand the economics of it.  Edit: fair enough, a refund would be fine
